hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Ibn Abbas: When asked about the apparent contradiction between different Quranic verses regarding speaking and silence on the Day of Judgment, he said: It is a long day with many stages. First they will not speak, then they will be permitted to dispute, then they will deny their shirk thinking it will help them, then Allah will seal their mouths, their limbs will speak against them, then their tongues will speak confirming their deeds. So they will not hide anything from Allah. They will say: We have been warned but denied, saying Allah has sent nothing.
